ygData.subject: Guildstuff and works of wisdom
ygData.msgSnippet: Afternoon or morning to all of you! David, if you are on today, could you list the servers that you have already visited and got the guild started on? And if
ygData.messageBody:
Afternoon or morning to all of you! David, if you are on today, could
you list the servers that you have already visited and got the guild
started on? And if it's possible, can I help in any way with getting the
guild on other servers? I've actually been on E'ci when Kyala has..talked
with her, etc. so I think Ive built a report with her.
For those of you on Rodect, I started a Barbarian Warrior on there the
other night...he's 4th level now ( I did this in less than an hour..power
leveling ROCKS!). His name is Synder. I think with a little...boosting..I
can go up 3 to 4 levels each night...just need a CORP of CLERICS behind me!
LOL!
For those of you on E'ci, look me up! Jadeeyes is me. Im KOS in
Freeport, so I make sure to hang out near there...I love danger!
Oh, something to remember...if you travel a long way to somewhere, ALWAYS
try to remember to get a BIND at where you traveled to.
Example:

I traveled from Wood Elf City to Freeport one LATE night to buy a
Barbed Whip from a guild mate, Bazul, for 100pp. I got there..got the
whip..logged off..then fell asleep on the couch. When I was playing last
night, I had FORGOT that I was not binded there and proceeded to whack the
meanies in Oasis. BARELY survived a spell casting madman when I was whacked
on the head by a Deep Water Goblin. It was then that a cold chill
surrounded my heart...I was STILL BOUND in Wood Elf City. SURE learnt MY
LESSON!

Oh, just to mention, I am now Guildless. No, I wasnt kicked out or did
I remove myself. My guild was vaporized because some of the members were
Kill Stealing, making nasty remarks to the GMs and the GUILD Leader couldnt
stop them...so POOF! GONE! Even though it saddens me greatly, I am NOW in
possition to assist FULLY with getting our guild up and going on E'ci once
we untangle things there.
Again, if I can do or say something as proxy for you David on E'ci,
let me know! <smile>

Sandy (Jaded warrior of E'ci and candy bar lover!)
